channel.title: Help pleas with cache file
channel.description: how can i make the cache not in the client file cause some people dont wanna move it to the c:\ is theyr a way to remove cache and make it a jar or something so nobody need to move the cache cause my download because 200mb and without cache its 25mb pleas help

item.title: Help pleas with cache file
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

yeah, get a autocachedownloader.java (auto cache downloader) file.
and do some editing in your signlink.java so it’s sent to input & search for the cache somewhere besides the client folder.
“Right Click > Spell Check”

Read full topic
